title: Youngkhngdiddy
author: Youngkhngdiddy
content: I think the newly elected government go better pass the previous one and president tinibu go help improve our economy, education and technology just like e been do to lagos state when em be governor.¬†Judging from how em done take dey open borders and a lot of promises wey em done make, eh even talk say eh carry the youths for mind and most of the people eh go give appointments na youth.Wetin una think about this talk?

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: We are not seers He opened border? Give us a valid link about it. I am bored of Nigerian news these days but I have not heard of anything like that.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Youngkhngdiddy on May 31, 2023, 04:32:59 PM I think the newly elected government go better pass the previous one and president tinibu go help improve our economy, education and technology just like e been do to lagos state when em be governor.¬†Judging from how em done take dey open borders and a lot of promises wey em done make, eh even talk say eh carry the youths for mind and most of the people eh go give appointments na youth.Wetin una think about this talk?He is barely just 2days old as Nigerian President, so we never can tell or predict how him administration go be like until¬† the next 100 to 365 days in office. But let me just assume say he improves our economy, education and technology just as the way you don talk am, but for me, I don already comot my mind this matter, and ready to accept anything that comes, as I doubt if there will be any big difference since na still them A.P.C government.

comments.author: Pokapoka124
comments.body: This man you never tire for politicians many promises, the new Presido never even sidown well for seat before casala don dey burst everywhere. First day e hit the ground running, na subsidy e first remove, all the fuel stations for my area never open since yesterday, black market now dey sell 650 per litre. Transporters don increase price sharpaly, I nor dey see the good things wey you dey feel say this administration go bring.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: There have been crisis all over the nation since the new president's anouncement of subsidy removal, the petroleum marketers have locked their supplies and NNPC have issued a new fuel price regime which in some places are as high as #500+ and this has become something that may affect the new president early pickup, facing fuel scarcity in this early time of his tenure will only spread more negative perception of his administration and even though he wants to increase fuels price or remove fuel subsidy he must make some adequate arrangement that will help ease the pain of the subsidy removal on the mases.

comments.author: Silver005
comments.body: My dear we never can tell ooh until he is one months or two months let's see where he will start up with and we will know his footsteps ok,but for now I will not say anything because this people are very decitfully, and another thing is that this people are very wise they can try to make you feel happy and trust them for this first tenure and by the second tenure you go pay back what you have enjoyed, and by then they will show you the real person they are.And what makes me feel scared is that The new president have not spent 24hrs and the whole nation are clamoring look at his first record does it show a good government I am afraid oooh, look at the price of fuel pump now, are we going up or down, does this show a sign of getting better or worst, can't we celebrate this beautiful country for one as a citizen and poor mases, what crime did we commit in this country,we have never celebrate good thing in this country for ones why, this is from frying pan to fire oooh,

comments.author: SmartCharpa
comments.body: Quote from: Silver005 on May 31, 2023, 10:12:16 PMAnd what makes me feel scared is that The new president have not spent 24hrs and the whole nation are clamoring look at his first record does it show a good government I am afraid oooh, look at the price of fuel pump now, are we going up or down, does this show a sign of getting better or worst, can't we celebrate this beautiful country for one as a citizen and poor mases, what crime did we commit in this country,we have never celebrate good thing in this country for ones why, this is from frying pan to fire oooh,We don't just know for them maybe dey want us to dey complain each time about problems we are facing in this country as una all said we can't tell what future might turn up or what he is planning to do if not this wahala don dey too much every day na we no fit get single peace say we dey happy for once say our country wahala don reduce make we just dey pray and continue our hustling we should not put this governments promises for mind as we never know waiting go sup tomorrow.

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: Quote from: Youngkhngdiddy on May 31, 2023, 08:19:44 PMQuote from: Charles-Tim on May 31, 2023, 04:43:33 PMWe are not seers He opened border? Give us a valid link about it. I am bored of Nigerian news these days but I have not heard of anything like that.  My brother i no talk say this my news na fact oo, na based on rumours and I they belive on the positive outcome of the rumours say em go open the borders soon.You go de carry rumor dey judge person wey never balance for him presidential seat.Me self dey all ears to see many news but I never hear this kind rumor wey you carry come. But make we sha de put hope say something positive go come out of this government oo, because with the way wey things wan take they be from the first day wey him enter that office ehn, Na only God fit save this country.

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: I am facing difficulties in analyzing an individual who is willing to go to extreme lengths, even resorting to harming the entire country, in order to attain a position in the Government. This person has already not assembled his cabinet and has begun governing. It raises concerns about whom they are consulting with when making crucial policies. The price of fuel has risen to 500 naira, and today's newspapers are reporting the devaluation of the national currency. Inflation has reached its peak, putting immense pressure on the people. However, instead of taking measures to alleviate this situation, their first course of action is to exacerbate it further. The issue of subsidies is pervasive, as acknowledged by the NLC executives. It appears that the primary objective of this Government is to increase the size of their own wealth accumulation, plain and simple!

comments.author: Kelward
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on May 31, 2023, 04:43:33 PMWe are not seers He opened border? Give us a valid link about it. I am bored of Nigerian news these days but I have not heard of anything like that. One of the things wey I like about this bitcointalk forum be say dem like authenticity, diafo, dem always like members to dey show source link of external quotes. Me too I de Wonder de border wey the president open, maybe I don forget. Make we no toot get bored, because we no get choice but to hope for a better Nigeria, because if the country no¬† better, somehow somehow e go affect us negatively. Although the wrong timing of the fuel subsidy removal dey affect us negatively, but I still de wish the new administration all the best.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: Quote from: Youngkhngdiddy on May 31, 2023, 08:19:44 PMQuote from: Charles-Tim on May 31, 2023, 04:43:33 PMWe are not seers He opened border? Give us a valid link about it. I am bored of Nigerian news these days but I have not heard of anything like that.  My brother i no talk say this my news na fact oo, na based on rumours and I they belive on the positive outcome of the rumours say em go open the borders soon.Based on sae na rumor you come carry am come here like sae na known fact wey don happen for the country. However sha, you and I can't tell whether the rumor will turn out to be true or not until em use em mouth talk am. But before then make you just stay mute than spreading further of the unconfirmed(rumor) news that is yet to happen. Having said that, na better new Nigeria wey everyone d pray for. We Nigerians are tired of the hardship wey the politicians don cause us. No be every new government wey we go d experience another level of sufferness. Make things better for the country kwalu. Em no go be bad thing if it does for a whole tenure. Only Tinubu few days in office, petroleum product don hike throughout the federation because of the removal of fuel subsidy without any solutions put in place before that.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Youngkhngdiddy on May 31, 2023, 04:32:59 PM I think the newly elected government go better pass the previous one and president tinibu go help improve our economy, education and technology just like e been do to lagos state when em be governor.¬†Judging from how em done take dey open borders and a lot of promises wey em done make, eh even talk say eh carry the youths for mind and most of the people eh go give appointments na youth.Wetin una think about this talk?Make e no be say all this one na talk talk political capping, I hope him follow everything up because me I dun dey like as him dey run the government already. I like the idea say him dey try new things wey the previous governments dem never try. Worst part e no work den to go back to a system wey no dey work since. Abi una no hear say Cameroon dey protest subsidy wey Tinubu commot for Nigeria. As I see the news the thing just weak me, e mean say Tinubu no been dey joke when him talk say we just dey subsidized fuel for other African countries dey suffer our own. Signs already dun dey should say we dey in good hands.Sha make we no dey too quick to judge am because na so Buhari government start, everything been dey go smoothly but in the next tenure na so yawa just gaz. You know say when something dun too bad, the next person just get dey receive praises even when dem no do anything. As the country dun bad so, anybody fit enter the seat and make the country breath small air because no how dem wan worst past the last administration. Make we just give the man support and better time and see how he's going to handles the country.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: Quote from: Youngkhngdiddy on May 31, 2023, 04:32:59 PM I think the newly elected government go better pass the previous one and president tinibu go help improve our economy, education and technology just like e been do to lagos state when em be governor.¬†Judging from how em done take dey open borders and a lot of promises wey em done make, eh even talk say eh carry the youths for mind and most of the people eh go give appointments na youth.Wetin una think about this talk?The new president have made some moves for the country and I hope he‚Äôs able to accomplish his missions for the betterment of the country. We all know say for our country na our leaders wey dey top dey spoil d government. Him fit get better intentions now but people wey him employ under am fit no dey deliver well, I hope say dem all do well dis time around and make him no hesitate to remove anyone wey dey fuck up. I see dis him government go tough and na tough leaders our country need now for people wey misbehave and mismanage our resources to get second thought of dem still wan continue.

comments.author: Timmzzy
comments.body: abeg this news wey i dey hear say THEM DONE OPENDED BOARDER, abeg how true e be, because true true say boader don open ni be say things go better small this year because like this life don really show people SHEGE PROMAX  . the only thing wey dey keep most of us alive na this financial market and investment wey we sabi.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: Quote from: Timmzzyabeg this news wey i dey hear say THEM DONE OPENDED BOARDER, abeg how true e be, because true true say boader don open ni be say things go better small this year because like this life don really show people SHEGE PROMAX  . the only thing wey dey keep most of us alive na this financial market and investment wey we sabi.Some of the boarders Muhammad Buhari X president closed during his regime still remain closed according to Nigeria custom who spoke the other day concerning reopen of boarder which he said boarder was not close apart from the one dey discovered say bad things dey take enter our country.

comments.author: Juicyhome
comments.body: A better Nigeria is possible if we don't shy away from responsibility and participate in politics just as our best brain and elites does in 1999 when Nigeria approached the 4 Republic, many of our nation best brain and Democrats run away from politics for the¬† fair of the 4 Republic to fail as the 1,2,3 Republic. Many of our leaders was scared that the 4 Republic will not succeed like others, and they allowed bad eggs take advantage of their absent and Dominate the 4 Republic.¬† Obasanjo took the advantage and became president,¬† he brought his old friends into politics,¬† till date they are still running leadership in this country,¬† our best brain has no option than to work as slave to them. Today is affecting all spheres of the country, Better Nigeria is still possible if we can take over government from this old men that' doesn't care about our wellbeing. But regardless wherever you find yourself serving or represent this great country do it heartedly. I believe with time would get there in the future.

comments.author: AVE5
comments.body: Quote from: Youngkhngdiddy on May 31, 2023, 04:32:59 PM I think the newly elected government go better pass the previous one and president tinibu go help improve our economy, education and technology just like e been do to lagos state when em be governor.¬†Judging from how em done take dey open borders and a lot of promises wey em done make, eh even talk say eh carry the youths for mind and most of the people eh go give appointments na youth.Wetin una think about this talk?You just talked like you've taken bribe to hype this government. üòÇ.So even being obvious of what we're passing through with the current government you do think we're approaching to a more governing society?You should had atleast made a valid point showcasing an inch that promises this government will be better than the past üòè.Let's refrain from being easily carried away by the speeches of our presidencies because they're all full of lies with the media covering sugarcoating their ugly doings and if it's to believe politicians by their words, we'd had achieved all that promises by the past governments during their elections and while resumed offices. So Tinubu isn't different from the rest.In digress, cryptocurrency has existed under the governance of few past regimes now and which of the past government has frustrated the crypto industry like this Tinubu regime does?If he truly had the good intentions on the masses particularly on the youths as said, he'd had considered how lucrative cryptocurrencies has been a means establishing and empowering this same youths but yet he came forth battling with the same empowerment crypto industry in distabilizing the good returns the same youths makes out of the technology.So, nothing good is promising with this government yet and I don't know what border you mean the government has opened for operations as per said.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: How I only wish all these are expectations that are going to be implemented the same way as we have wish to see them come into reality, change is what can happen at any time if the government and the people all work together towards a common goal, we ha e to respect the way of how we address the government because those that are in it are still not people from another world, they are the same ones that have been around us and we see as brothers, they only have the opportunity of being a leader to take the position and govern the people, a better Nigerian is possible with all of us.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: Youngkhngdiddy on May 31, 2023, 04:32:59 PM I think the newly elected government go better pass the previous one and president tinibu go help improve our economy, education and technology just like e been do to lagos state when em be governor.¬†Judging from how em done take dey open borders and a lot of promises wey em done make, eh even talk say eh carry the youths for mind and most of the people eh go give appointments na youth.Wetin una think about this talk?Wait is this op still alive üò≥ I think he suppose come here come apologize for this false hope and just with all the anticipation I'm sorry to tell you op that, your expectations are already cut short as your president don already disappoint us wetin no good üòî Contrary, him no give any contract to the youths rather, them dey run the country like fan club and I no go blame them because even we wey be the youths don ready dey brain washed and we just believe we no get the power to take over power and I believe we don already hear about the case with one Africa country wey the military take over power abi, let's make that a point of motivation and act right.

comments.author: Juicyhome
comments.body: Like I told my friends who care to know ,japa if you have the resource to japa.Nigeria is not for the youth is for the old men, they have destroyed our future and if we dont leave the country now, our children will end up serving their children,¬† there's no future plan. What happened to our vision 2020 projected in 2010, this Country has no Blueprint for us and our children,¬† we live for today no hope for better future,¬† is a pity but that's the reality. But there is still hope, if only the old men can leave power to pthe youth with brain to pilot the affair of the nation. The econmy is not friendly.
